thread.title: After marathon speech, Pelosi continues to oppose spending bill

title: After marathon speech, Pelosi continues to oppose spending bill
text:
After marathon speech, Pelosi continues to oppose spending bill Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:09 
One day after her record setting eight-hour speech on the House floor, Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi continues to urge Speaker Paul Ryan for an open debate on immigration and says she will vote against the spending bill. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
One day after her record setting eight-hour speech on the House floor, Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi continues to urge Speaker Paul Ryan for an open debate on immigration and says she will vote against the spending bill. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EwQ7pV
